mutants.code:
import hashlib
import pathlib

def check_file_integrity(info, datadir):
    piece_len = info['']
    pieces = info['pieces']
    torrent_name = info['name']
    file_infos = info.get('files', [info])
    results = []
    for (i, file_info) in enumerate(file_infos):
        file_path = pathlib.Path(datadir, *file_info['path'])
        file_data = file_path.read_bytes()
        expected_hash = pieces[i * 20:(i + 1) * 20]
        file_hash = hashlib.sha1(file_data).digest()
        results.append((str(file_path), file_hash == expected_hash))
    return results

mutants.original_line: pieces = info['pieces']

import hashlib
import pathlib

def check_file_integrity(info, datadir):
    piece_len = info['piece length']
    pieces = info['pieces']
    torrent_name = info['name']
    file_infos = info.get('files', [info])
    results = []
    for (i, file_info) in enumerate(file_infos):
        file_path = pathlib.Path(datadir, *file_info['path'])
        file_data = file_path.read_bytes()
        expected_hash = pieces[i * 20:(i + -1) * 20]
        file_hash = hashlib.sha1(file_data).digest()
        results.append((str(file_path), file_hash == expected_hash))
    return results
